data.title: Schindler's Twist: The Bitter Battle Over the Righteous Gentile's Legendary List
data.meta_description: Forty Years After the Death of Oskar Schindler, a Jewish Argentinian Woman Is Taking Yad Vashem to Court for Ownership of Many of His Personal Documents, Including the List Itself. The Jerusalem Trial Is Revealing New Details About the German Industrialist's Personal Life.
